Includes one night in Gondor or Fangorn, a lunch or a dinner, a breakfast, a hoppy recovery drink, a sauna session, and access to the heated swimming pool.

He knows all of the cycling circuits in the area, whether you wish to cycle alone or in a group. The local cycling club of Spicheren/Alsting will give you a warm welcome if you wish to join them on sunday mornings.
